about_the_game:
A free add-on that adds Adult Only content to the game.

In the uncensored version you will find, among others:
- healing mini-games, such as abortions and various genitals mutilation
- interactive sex minigames
- additional sex scenes in the form of cutscenes
- additional sex scenes depicting demons and humans, visible in game's levels
- no censorship on the character's breasts and genitals
- additional "hellish orgy" orgy scene

content_descriptors.notes: Vulgar language, sex, violence, sexual violence, homosexual sex, abortions, sexual punishment, nudity

In the uncensored version you will find, among others:

name: Succubus - Unrated

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: i5-6500, Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050, RX 460 (or equivalent with at least 4GB of memory)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: i5-8600, Ryzen 5 3400G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060, RX 5700 (with at least 6GB of memory)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: A free add-on that adds Adult Only content to the game.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
